comments:
When running some automated tests that create markers then I get the following 
NPE. I can provide the test suite if needed.

!ENTRY org.eclipse.ui.workbench 4 2 Jul 08, 2003 22:25:22.377
!MESSAGE Problems occurred when invoking code from plug-
in: "org.eclipse.ui.workbench".
!STACK 0

Chris, I'm not sure if this is isolated to the Problems view or not.  Please 
reassign if necessary.
ViewPane.updateTitles now checks for a disposed label.
In addition, the marker views now properly unhook the resource listener when 
the view is closed.
This was fixed for M2.
